item.description:
Have you wanted to learn about urban composting or had trouble managing a healthy compost bin? Want to celebrate Earth Day and enjoy some time outdoors? Come learn the basics of turning yard and food waste into a valuable soil amendment in one of the most rewarding ecological activities that fits well in the city.

Lee Dwyer, Gardens Coordinator at Groundwork Somerville, will be leading a composting basics workshop at the Growing Center on Earth Day from 6-7 pm. Youâ€™ll learn the basics of what to compost, how to set up a simple worm bin, and how to run two different styles of outdoor bins, using the Growing Center as an outdoor classroom!

Suggested donation $5; all materials provided. Workshop will be canceled in the event of heavy rain.
item.name: Celebrate the Earth & Learn How to Compost
